summary.title: The Cave
summary.author: Bubba Gump
summary.about: See where your choices lead.  You can choose your own destiny, but can you escape fate?

firstChapter.teaser: This might be a good day to take some risks.

chapters.heading: The Cave
chapters.prose:
It's a nice day, so you decide to go for a walk.  As you stroll along, you see a clearing with an outcrop of rocks.  Something is unusual about these rocks, some blackness unlike the surrounding soil.  You notice that this is an opening to a cave.  It is dark inside, and you wonder how far it goes.

What would you like to do?

chapters.heading: A Cool Breeze
chapters.prose: As your eyes adjust to the light, you feel a cool breeze on your face.  You are drawn toward the musty smells as curiosity takes over.

nextChapterOptions.teaser: Explore the room you are in.

chapters.heading: You Die!
chapters.prose:
Unfortunately, fate is not on your side today.  As you step around the rocks, you are bitten by a rattlesnake.  Now you realize what that ominous noise was.  If only you had been paying attention.

Sorry.

chapters.heading: Slippery Slope
chapters.prose: As you head further into the cave, the floor becomes moist.  As you continue, things get slippery.  Next thing you know, you are sliding uncontrollably.

chapters.heading: Treasure
chapters.prose: You notice part of the cave floor is hollow.  With a little digging, you discover a treasure chest.  You are set for life.
